job_profile_classification.rationale: The job title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and the description focuses heavily on data analysis, reporting, and applying data science methods to business questions. While it mentions 'machine learning methods' and 'data-driven models', it lacks specific details about building, training, or deploying predictive or generative models, which are hallmarks of ML or GenAI Engineer roles. The emphasis is more on using data to provide insights and support business decisions rather than developing core AI systems.

phrases: Determining requirements for the application of data science methods to business questions
help Damen Digital Solutions address product development challenges
Giving insights to product-teams through presentation of data-driven recommendations
Identifying new business opportunities using data science methodologies
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand business needs, translate them into data science requirements, and provide actionable insights to product teams and for identifying new business opportunities.

phrases: Damen Digital Solutions makes data applicable to her stakeholders by making validated knowledge available
support them by data driven solutions

The company will take a leading role on three technical knowledge pillars; informatics and computer science, measurement technology and data analytics and -science, by developing and applying state-of-the-art know-how.
job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes making data applicable and available to stakeholders, supporting data-driven solutions, and developing expertise in data analytics and science, which are core to data engineering.

phrases: Using advanced analytical and machine learning methods to extract value from business data
Building data-driven models and reports to generate consumer insight
job_tasks.justification: The job mentions using 'machine learning methods' and 'building data-driven models', indicating some involvement in the modeling process, though the specifics of model types or complexity are not detailed.

phrases: Contributing to the Damen analytical tools
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to 'analytical tools' suggests some level of software development, likely related to building or enhancing data analysis platforms, but not necessarily user-facing applications.
There are no explicit mentions of deploying, monitoring, or maintaining models in production environments, which are key aspects of MLOps.

phrases: Giving insights to product-teams through presentation of data-driven recommendations
strong support from fellow dedicated team members
An open, informal, no-nonsense culture with short communication lines
support you to develop yourself in this position
Rapidly developing disciplines like computer science, measurement technology and data science are essential
developing and applying state-of-the-art know-how
extract value from business data
address product development challenges
Identifying new business opportunities using data science methodologies
Entrepreneurship is in our DNA
innovation is the driving force
take a leading role
take full responsibility
